LanguageData.RP_MessageShamed: {PAWN_labelShort} is overwhelmed with shame and trying to hide from others.
LanguageData.RP_MessageExperimentFail: {PAWN_labelShort}'s experiment failed, lowering the item's quality.
LanguageData.RP_BrilliantSuccessMessage: While working, {PAWN_labelShort} recognized a rare opportunity. Thanks to {PAWN_possessive} experimental streak, {PAWN_pronoun} took a chance and created something truly exceptional.
LanguageData.RP_ResilientSpiritMessage: {PAWN_labelShort} nearly broke down, but {PAWN_possessive} tenacity gave {PAWN_objective} new resolve.\n\nFor the next three days, negative moods will affect {PAWN_objective} only half as much.
LanguageData.RimpsycheDispositionRestartNeeded: You need to restart the game for these settings to take effect.
LanguageData.RimpsycheUsePerformanceModeThoughtToolti: Use performance mod. Mods directly referencing mood thought offset might ignore personality adjustment
LanguageData.RimpsycheMoodEmotionalityCTooltip: How much Emotionality affects a pawn's overall mood.
LanguageData.RimpsycheMoodOptimismCTooltip: How much Optimism affects a pawn's overall mood.
LanguageData.RimpsycheUseIndividualThoughtsTooltip: A pawn's personality influences the mood value of individual thoughts.
LanguageData.RimpsycheMoodIndividualCTooltip: How strongly a pawn's personality affects the mood impact of individual thoughts.
LanguageData.RimpsycheUseExperimentationTooltip: Pawns may experiment while crafting or building, either increasing or decreasing an item's quality.
LanguageData.RimpsycheUseSenseOfProgressTooltip: Pawns gain a mood boost from progress like earning skill XP, making quality items, or completing research. Ambitious pawns may become frustrated if they go too long without making progress.
LanguageData.RimpsycheUseResilientSpiritTooltip: Tenacious pawns has a chance to resist mentalbreaks and gain renewed resolve buff for three days instead. (Cooldown 60 days)
LanguageData.RimpsycheUseHideInShameTooltip: Modest pawns not dressed according to their ideology (naked for vanilla) will feel ashamed, and can eventually run away in shame from other pawns' prying eyes.
LanguageData.RimpsycheCheckMedicalOverShameTooltip: Pawns with health conditions suppress their shame until they are tended.
LanguageData.RimpsycheUseFightorFlightTooltip: In combat, fearful pawns may suffer panic attacks, while brave or aggressive pawns may get an adrenaline rush that temporarily boosts stats.
LanguageData.RimpsycheEnemyFightorFlightTooltip: Non-colonists may experience panic attacks or adrenaline rushes.
LanguageData.RimpsycheUseSendShameMessageTooltip: Send notifications when pawns run away in shame.
LanguageData.RimpsycheShowExperimentMoteTooltip: Show a mote when pawns experiment.
LanguageData.RimpsycheShowResilientSpiritMoteTooltip: Show a mote when a pawn triggers the Resilient Spirit.
LanguageData.RimpsycheShowAdrenalineMoteTooltip: Show a mote when a pawn's adrenaline rush stage progresses.
LanguageData.RimpsycheShowPanicMoteTooltip: Show a mote on pawns fleeing in panic.
